description: The Local Weather REST API (also called City and Town Weather API) method allows you to access current weather conditions, the next 14 days of accurate and reliable weather forecast, Air Quality Data, Weather Alerts and Monthly Climate Averages for over 4 million cities and towns worldwide. The Local Weather API returns weather elements such as temperature, precipitation (rainfall), weather description, weather icon, wind speed, etc.
name: world_weather_online_api_local_weather_api

improvement: The current tool was not selected in any of the queries, indicating that it may not be competitive with other weather forecasting tools. The most commonly used tools were weatherapi_com_forecast_weather_api and forecast_rapidapigetforecastsummarybycoordinates, which suggests that users prefer more specific or summary-based forecasts. To improve competitiveness, I will revise the tool's description to highlight its unique features and advantages over other tools.
description: The Local Weather REST API (also called City and Town Weather API) method offers a comprehensive weather solution for over 4 million cities and towns worldwide. It provides current weather conditions, accurate and reliable 14-day forecasts, Air Quality Data, Weather Alerts, and Monthly Climate Averages. With its extensive coverage and detailed weather elements such as temperature, precipitation, wind speed, and more, this API is ideal for applications requiring a broad range of weather information.
name: comprehensive_weather_api
